issue.title: [C++] Unchecked floating point division by 0 should succeed
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9811](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9811). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Currently we return a "division by zero" error even for unchecked floating point division. Instead we should simply succeed and store an infinite (or NaN if 0/0 is requested).
